!Lizardman of the Wastelands: Ah ...! The spirit of wind up in the north? I've seen it a few times ... I hate that race, so I don't even associate with it at all. I just saw it from afar and it didn't even say hello, so I passed by. But why did you bring up the sylph? [Quest _404_PathToWizard 30410_1|Talk about the noise]
